rules.prop: x ^ Suc m = x * x ^ m

content.name: less
content.prop: less x y = neg(less_eq y x)

content.name: real_add_ldistrib
content.prop: x * (y + z) = x * y + x * z

content.name: real_le_ladd_imp
content.prop: y <= z --> x + y <= x + z

content.name: real_of_nat_le
content.prop: (of_nat::nat ⇒ real) m ≤ (of_nat::nat ⇒ real) n ⟷ m ≤ n

content.name: real_of_nat_add
content.prop: (of_nat::nat ⇒ real) m + (of_nat::nat ⇒ real) n = (of_nat::nat ⇒ real) (m + n)

content.name: real_of_nat_mul
content.prop: (of_nat::nat ⇒ real) m * (of_nat::nat ⇒ real) n = (of_nat::nat ⇒ real) (m * n)

content.name: real_eq_add_lcancel

proof.th: ⊢ x + y = x + z ⟶ y = z
x + y = x + z ⊢ x + y = x + z
x + y = x + z ⊢ -x + (x + y) = -x + (x + z)
x + y = x + z ⊢ -x + x + y = -x + x + z
x + y = x + z ⊢ 0 + y = 0 + z
x + y = x + z ⊢ y = z
x + y = x + z ⊢ y = z
⊢ x + y = x + z ⟶ y = z
⊢ y = z ⟶ x + y = x + z
y = z ⊢ x + y = x + z
⊢ y = z ⟶ x + y = x + z
⊢ x + y = x + z ⟷ y = z

content.prop: x + y = x + z ⟷ y = z

content.name: real_eq_add_rcancel

proof.args: real_eq_add_lcancel, z + x = z + y ⟷ x = y
proof.th: ⊢ z + x = z + y ⟷ x = y

proof.args: real_add_comm, x + z = y + z ⟷ x = y
proof.th: ⊢ x + z = y + z ⟷ x = y

content.prop: x + z = y + z ⟷ x = y

proof.args: real_add_linv, x * (-y + y) = -(x * y) + x * y

proof.th: ⊢ x * -y + x * y = -(x * y) + x * y
⊢ ∀n. (of_nat::nat ⇒ real) x ^ n = of_nat (x ^ n) ⟶ (of_nat::nat ⇒ real) x ^ Suc n = of_nat (x ^ Suc n)

proof.args: nat_induct, {}, {P: λn::nat. (of_nat::nat ⇒ real) x ^ n = of_nat (x ^ n), x: n}

content.name: greater_eq
content.prop: greater_eq m n = less_eq n m

content.name: greater
content.prop: greater m n = less n m

content.name: abs
content.prop: abs n = (if 0 <= n then n else -n)

content.name: real_eqI_from_lt_gt
content.prop: (x < y --> false) --> (y < x --> false) --> x = y

content.name: max
content.prop: max m n = if m <= n then n else m

content.name: min
content.prop: min m n = if m <= n then m else n

content.name: real_sgn
content.prop: real_sgn x = if 0 < x then 1 else if x <0 then -1 else 0

content.name: sqrt
content.prop: sqrt x = THE y. real_sgn y =  real_sgn x & y ^ (2::nat) = abs x
